page.title: 14Biography-Faversham Child
page.content:
Most mornings I wake up at 7.30. I have my breakfast and then I get dressed ready for school. For {breakfast}I have{Rice Krispies.}At {school}during playtime I play with my best friend Sarah Hughes. Sometimes I play with Hayley and Amanda. After playtime we have{swimming}in our school pool. By the way{my name is {Susan Atkinson.}I am 8 years of age. My{Mums}name is{Carol.}My{Dads}name is {Robert.}I have a{brother}called {Alan,}he is 11.{We live at 15 Laxton {Way.}My{Mum works in British Home {Stores. My Dad works at B.M.M.Weston. My Mum is 40 and my Dad is 42. My brother Alan has done his 11+,he is going to the{Queen Elizabeth School.
{Susan Atkinson
